successes.title: Deltaprintr - A simple, affordable 3D Printer!
successes.description: The Deltaprintr is the most affordable 3D Printer starting at $499.

Pledges.description: Any contribution helps! You'll get backer-only updates on the project and will be listed as a Backer on our website!
Want to learn more about the project? Get a download of our Kickstarter Journey Book. How we started, what we learned - all the good stuff.
We’ll send you a 3D-printed bottle opener! For… soda? You'll also get our Kickstarter Journey Book. Shipping included.
Get one of those shnazzy orange Deltaprintr t-shirts we wore to Maker Faire. You'll also get our Kickstarter Journey Book.
Deltaprintr laser-cut parts only, for those who want to experiment. Add $30 for shipping within the U.S.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - As a thank you for getting us started! Includes everything you need to build your own Deltaprintr, along with an easy to read assembly guide. Add $45 for shipping in the U.S. Please see FAQ for international shipping.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - As a thank you for getting us started! Includes everything you need to build your own Deltaprintr, along with an easy to read assembly guide. Add $45 for shipping in the U.S. Please see FAQ for international shipping.

Complete Deltaprintr kit! Includes everything you need to build your own Deltaprintr, along with an easy to read assembly manual. Add $45 for shipping in the U.S. Please see FAQ for international shipping.

Complete Deltaprintr kit! Includes everything you need to build your own Deltaprintr, along with an easy to read assembly manual. Add $45 for shipping in the U.S. Please see FAQ for international shipping.
EARLY BIRD FULLY ASSEMBLED - All you have to do is thread the fishing line (guide included). Add $65 for shipping in the USA. Please see FAQ for international shipping.
EARLY BIRD FULLY ASSEMBLED - All you have to do is thread the fishing line (guide included). Add $65 for shipping in the USA. Please see FAQ for international shipping.
FULLY ASSEMBLED - All you have to do is thread the fishing line (guide included). Add $65 for shipping in the USA. Please see FAQ for international shipping.
XL FULLY ASSEMBLED - Double the print volume! All you have to do is thread the fishing line (guide included). Add $115 for shipping.
Get a fully assembled and tested Deltaprintr, with a custom engraved bed signed by the team. And if you can get to NYC, we’ll treat you to dinner! Travel expenses not included, great time guaranteed.
